mapper.sql: ID, COLUMN_ID, MENU_ID, TITLE, NAME, PATH, UUID, CREATE_ACCT, CREATE_TIME, IS_TOP, TOP_TIME, ISSUE_TIME, IS_FLAG,sort,content1,content2,content3,content4,content5
mapper.insert: insert into tec_file (ID, COLUMN_ID, MENU_ID, TITLE, NAME, PATH, UUID, CREATE_ACCT, CREATE_TIME, IS_TOP, TOP_TIME, ISSUE_TIME, IS_FLAG, REMARK,sort,content1,content2,content3,content4,content5) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{columnId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isTop,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{topTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{content2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{content3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{content4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{content5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update tec_file
COLUMN_ID = #{columnId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_ACCT = #{createAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_TOP = #{isTop,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
TOP_TIME = #{topTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSUE_TIME = #{issueTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_FLAG = #{isFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content1 = #{content1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content2 = #{content2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content3 = #{content3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content4 = #{content4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content5 = #{content5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tec_file set COLUMN_ID = #{columnId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_ACCT = #{createAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_TOP = #{isTop,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, TOP_TIME = #{topTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSUE_TIME = #{issueTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_FLAG = #{isFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content1 = #{content1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content2 = #{content2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content3 = #{content3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content4 = #{content4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content5 = #{content5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE tec_file SET IS_TOP=0 WHERE TOP_TIME < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.select: SELECT f.* FROM tec_file f WHERE f.IS_FLAG=0 AND f.column_id=1 AND f.MENU_ID=#{menuId} ORDER BY sort,ISSUE_TIME DESC

select * from tec_file f where menu_id=1501 and (content4 >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') or ISSUE_TIME >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') or content3 >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') ) and f.IS_FLAG=0 ORDER BY sort, ISSUE_TIME DESC
select * from tec_file f where menu_id=1502 and f.IS_FLAG=0 ORDER BY ISSUE_TIME DESC limit 0,10
